Title: The Cruise
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Tricia McAlpin, Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake comes face-to-face with his old nemesis Doug Judy as he and Amy go on a cruise. Meanwhile, Holt's sister comes to town for a visit, and Diaz and Boyle fight over a rent-controlled apartment which was a crime scene.
